member.name: M:Cordon.BankCardValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[1-9]\\d{11,18}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 11 and at most 18 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.remarks:
Pattern:
^([a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?\\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Loop greedily at least once.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Za-z].
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a character in the set [-0-9A-Za-z] greedily at most 61 times.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Za-z].
○ Match '.'.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Za-z] atomically at least twice.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

Explanation:

○ Match a sequence of expressions.

○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily at least 7 and at most 8 times.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least once.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Cordon.UserNameValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[a-zA-Z](?!.*[_-]{2})[\\w-]{2,14}[a-zA-Z0-9]$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Za-z].
○ Zero-width negative lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [-_] exactly 2 times.
○ Match a character in the set [-\w] greedily at least 2 and at most 14 times.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Za-z].
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
